item.name: Aegis Angel
item.text: Flying When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent is indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy that permanent. An indestructible creature can't be destroyed by damage.)

item.name: Alabaster Mage
item.text: {1}{W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
item.flavorText: "We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons." —Alabaster creed

item.name: Angelic Destiny
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types. When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.

item.name: Angel's Mercy
item.text: You gain 7 life.
item.flavorText: Angels appear before both the blessed and the cursed, though most don't know which they are until they feel either the angel's kiss or her sword.

item.name: Arbalest Elite
item.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.
item.flavorText: There are few things as satisfying as a good, healthy thunk.

item.name: Archon of Justice
item.text: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.
item.flavorText: In dark times, Truth bears a blade.

item.name: Armored Warhorse
item.flavorText: "When we of the Northern Verge claim a mount, no peasant's nag will do. It must be as strong as our virtue, and must join us of its own will." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

item.name: Assault Griffin
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Griffins do not serve. They give freely to those they trust." —Amira, skycaptain of Thune

item.name: Auramancer
item.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

item.name: Benalish Veteran
item.text: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "One day I will rest and join my comrades in the afterlife, but not while scum like you still sully this world."

item.name: Celestial Purge
item.text: Exile target black or red permanent.
item.flavorText: "A world without evil? Boring. Give me vile fiends to smite and banish any day." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

item.name: Day of Judgment
item.text: Destroy all creatures.

item.name: Demystify
item.text: Destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: Behind every mage is a trail of shattered lies.

item.name: Divine Favor
item.text: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
item.flavorText: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

item.name: Elite Vanguard
item.flavorText: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

item.name: Gideon Jura
item.text: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. -2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

item.name: Gideon's Avenger
item.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on Gideon's Avenger.
item.flavorText: "The good don't sit and wait for the evil to act. They prepare to defend. They prepare to punish."

item.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

item.name: Grand Abolisher
item.text: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.
item.flavorText: "Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness."

item.name: Griffin Rider
item.text: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.
item.flavorText: After fighting alongside the griffin riders, older knights of Thune learned to admire a mount that could rip an enemy to shreds in seconds.

item.name: Griffin Sentinel
item.text: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
item.flavorText: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

item.name: Guardians' Pledge
item.text: White creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A dozen fighting for each other are worth a thousand fighting for themselves.

item.name: Honor of the Pure
item.text: White creatures you control get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

item.name: Lifelink
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
item.flavorText: The spoils of war are not measured only in gold and silver.

item.name: Mesa Enchantress
item.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Scholars seek to understand the way the world is. I wish to shape the world into what it should be."

item.name: Mighty Leap
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." —Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

item.name: Oblivion Ring
item.text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.name: Pacifism
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
item.flavorText: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

item.name: Peregrine Griffin
item.text: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: A griffin is not just an eagle's wings and a lion's claws. It is also the fiercest of hearts.

item.name: Personal Sanctuary
item.text: During your turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
item.flavorText: "There is a place deep within my soul where no foe can intrude and no tyrant can conquer." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

item.name: Pride Guardian
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

item.name: Roc Egg
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Roc Egg dies, put a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: A thin shell lies between the roc and a world of bite-sized treats.

item.name: Serra Angel
item.text: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
item.flavorText: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

item.name: Siege Mastodon
item.flavorText: "The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!" —General Avitora

item.name: Spirit Mantle
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures. (It can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by creatures.)
item.flavorText: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

item.name: Stave Off
item.text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of that color.)

item.name: Stonehorn Dignitary
item.text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips his or her next combat phase.
item.flavorText: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

item.name: Stormfront Pegasus
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.

item.name: Sun Titan
item.text: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: A blazing sun that never sets.

item.name: Timely Reinforcements
item.text: If you have less life than an opponent, you gain 6 life. If you control fewer creatures than an opponent, put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The gods are not always kind, but they do have a soft spot for plucky underdogs.

item.name: Æther Adept
item.text: When Æther Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear."

item.name: Alluring Siren
item.text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
item.flavorText: She lures victims with promises of flesh, captures them in a net of deceit, and destroys them in the embrace of the sea.

item.name: Amphin Cutthroat
item.flavorText: "The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war." —Gor Muldrak, Cryptohistories

item.name: Aven Fleetwing
item.text: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
item.flavorText: "It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses." —Vulok, elvish archer

item.name: Azure Mage
item.text: {3}{U}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived." —Azure creed

item.name: Belltower Sphinx
item.text: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Cancel
item.text: Counter target spell.

item.name: Chasm Drake
item.text: Flying Whenever Chasm Drake attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise." —Garl, drake trainer

item.name: Coral Merfolk
item.flavorText: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.

item.name: Divination
item.text: Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

item.name: Djinn of Wishes
item.text: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

item.name: Flashfreeze
item.text: Counter target red or green spell.
item.flavorText: "Is cold merely the absence of heat, or a force unto itself? Would a display of its power help you decide?" —Zubarek, Icewinder Magus

item.name: Flight
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.
item.flavorText: "Those who claim to know the world in its entirety rarely have the requisite perspective." —Ulmarus the Wise

item.name: Frost Breath
item.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: If you have to be stuck somewhere for a while, it's better to be stuck there with a friend.

item.name: Frost Titan
item.text: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.name: Harbor Serpent
item.text: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.) Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

item.name: Ice Cage
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

item.name: Jace, Memory Adept
item.text: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. 0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. -7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

item.name: Jace's Archivist
item.text: {U}, {T}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
item.flavorText: "This is a sacred duty. Master Beleren's trust has bought an eternity of my loyalty."

item.name: Jace's Erasure
item.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

item.name: Levitation
item.text: Creatures you control have flying.
item.flavorText: "Why fight over scraps of land when there's so much sky waiting to be claimed?"

item.name: Lord of the Unreal
item.text: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
item.flavorText: "The dream does not end until I say so."

item.name: Mana Leak
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
item.flavorText: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

item.name: Master Thief
item.text: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.
item.flavorText: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.

item.name: Merfolk Looter
item.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

item.name: Merfolk Mesmerist
item.text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Don't you think if I saw a half-woman, half-fish with three glowing eyes, I'd have remembered?" —Drugo, town guard

item.name: Mind Control
item.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "Every primitive mind has a motive. Easy to find, and eminently exploitable." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Mind Unbound
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a lore counter on Mind Unbound, then draw a card for each lore counter on Mind Unbound.
item.flavorText: The creations of the hand are confined by reality. The creations of the mind know no such limits.

item.name: Negate
item.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
item.flavorText: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

item.name: Phantasmal Bear
item.text: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
item.flavorText: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." —Pol Jamaar, illusionist

item.name: Phantasmal Dragon
item.text: Flying When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
item.flavorText: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

item.name: Phantasmal Image
item.text: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it gains "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

item.name: Ponder
item.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

item.name: Redirect
item.text: You may choose new targets for target spell.
item.flavorText: "It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain." —Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Skywinder Drake
item.text: Flying Skywinder Drake can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: It's so light and fragile that it can glide where the air is thinnest.

item.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
item.text: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.name: Time Reversal
item.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.
item.flavorText: "Any oaf can conquer a kingdom. It takes true power to conquer time." —Shai Fusan, archmage

item.name: Turn to Frog
item.text: Target creature loses all abilities and becomes a 1/1 blue Frog until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Ribbit."

item.name: Unsummon
item.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "It's nothing personal. I'd just prefer if you weren't." —Ashurel, voidmage

item.name: Visions of Beyond
item.text: Draw a card. If a graveyard has twenty or more cards in it, draw three cards instead.
item.flavorText: "The past is the foundation for all that exists in the present. We merely reconstruct what our ancestors have already discovered." —Sachimir, Sage of Memories

item.name: Blood Seeker
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
item.flavorText: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.

item.name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
item.text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

item.name: Bloodrage Vampire
item.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
item.flavorText: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

item.name: Brink of Disaster
item.text: Enchant creature or land When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
item.flavorText: "When you find yourself teetering on the edge of oblivion, mine will be the hands taking pleasure in giving you the final push." —Liliana Vess

item.name: Call to the Grave
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

item.name: Cemetery Reaper
item.text: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Every grave cradles a recruit.

item.name: Child of Night
item.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
item.flavorText: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

item.name: Consume Spirit
item.text: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.
item.flavorText: "You clerics brag about your strength of spirit, yet I take away the tiniest fragment, and you crumple like a rag doll." —Sorin Markov

item.name: Dark Favor
item.text: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
item.flavorText: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

item.name: Deathmark
item.text: Destroy target green or white creature.
item.flavorText: "Let the final vision of doom be etched upon their unblinking eyes." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

item.name: Devouring Swarm
item.text: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Devouring Swarm gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Their arrival is heralded by the deafening hum of ten thousand wings. Their departure is marked by the silence of the dead.

item.name: Diabolic Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

item.name: Disentomb
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: "Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh—sorry." —Liliana Vess

item.name: Distress
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "Of course I'm sure I've gone mad. The little man who crawled out of my eye was quite clear on this."

item.name: Doom Blade
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

item.name: Drifting Shade
item.text: Flying {B}: Drifting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It stalks the fens by the light of the full moon, gathering shadows as it floats among them.

item.name: Duskhunter Bat
item.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying
item.flavorText: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

item.name: Grave Titan
item.text: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Death in form and function.

item.name: Gravedigger
item.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: His grim ritual ushers the dead to their new life.

item.name: Hideous Visage
item.text: Creatures you control gain intimidate until end of turn. (Each of those creatures can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
item.flavorText: "Seeing you cower before me is its own reward."

item.name: Mind Rot
item.text: Target player discards two cards.
item.flavorText: Not every thought is a good one.

item.name: Monomania
item.text: Target player chooses a card in his or her hand and discards the rest.
item.flavorText: "What do vermin cling to when all hope is lost?" —Sorin Markov

item.name: Onyx Mage
item.text: {1}{B}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
item.flavorText: "We wield death and darkness, powers that make lesser mages tremble in fear." —Onyx creed

item.name: Reassembling Skeleton
item.text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

item.name: Royal Assassin
item.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

item.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
item.text: Flying When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

item.name: Sengir Vampire
item.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
item.flavorText: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

item.name: Smallpox
item.text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
item.flavorText: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

item.name: Sorin Markov
item.text: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to target creature or player and you gain 2 life. -3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. -7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

item.name: Sorin's Thirst
item.text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

item.name: Sorin's Vengeance
item.text: Sorin's Vengeance deals 10 damage to target player and you gain 10 life.
item.flavorText: "Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end."

item.name: Sutured Ghoul
item.text: Trample As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

item.name: Taste of Blood
item.text: Taste of Blood deals 1 damage to target player and you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams." —Bram Stoker, Dracula

item.name: Tormented Soul
item.text: Tormented Soul can't block and is unblockable.
item.flavorText: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

item.name: Vampire Outcasts
item.text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.name: Vengeful Pharaoh
item.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Whenever combat damage is dealt to you or a planeswalker you control, if Vengeful Pharaoh is in your graveyard, destroy target attacking creature, then put Vengeful Pharaoh on top of your library.

item.name: Warpath Ghoul
item.flavorText: Ghouls are often found skulking on the fringes of great battles, showing themselves only to snatch the wounded and weak, dragging their victims screaming into the shadows.

item.name: Wring Flesh
item.text: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Don't blame me. You're the one walking around with skin." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

item.name: Zombie Goliath
item.flavorText: "Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

item.name: Zombie Infestation
item.text: Discard two cards: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

item.name: Act of Treason
item.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
item.flavorText: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." —Sarkhan Vol

item.name: Blood Ogre
item.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

item.name: Bonebreaker Giant
item.flavorText: One thing's for sure—his fists are harder than your skull.

item.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
item.text: +1: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to target creature or player. -2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. -6: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six target creatures and/or players.

item.name: Chandra's Outrage
item.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
item.flavorText: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

item.name: Chandra's Phoenix
item.text: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Circle of Flame
item.text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.
item.flavorText: "Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?" —Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Combust
item.text: Combust can't be countered by spells or abilities. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

item.name: Crimson Mage
item.text: {R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
item.flavorText: "We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright." —Crimson creed

item.name: Fiery Hellhound
item.text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: There's nothing more exciting than a game of fetch the still-beating heart.

item.name: Fireball
item.text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players. Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

item.name: Firebreathing
item.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The mage breathed in life-giving air and breathed out death-bringing fire.

item.name: Flameblast Dragon
item.text: Flying Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: He marks his territory with fire and wrath, etching the mountainside with his charring breath.

item.name: Fling
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: About halfway to the target, Snukk vowed that he had been tricked for the last time.

item.name: Furyborn Hellkite
item.text: Bloodthirst 6 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying
item.flavorText: "Careful. A drop of blood here means death for us all." —Kalek, mountain guide

item.name: Goblin Arsonist
item.text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

item.name: Goblin Bangchuckers
item.text: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Bangchuckers deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If you lose the flip, Goblin Bangchuckers deals 2 damage to itself.

item.name: Goblin Chieftain
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.
item.flavorText: "It's time for the ‘Smash, Smash' song!"

item.name: Goblin Fireslinger
item.text: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

item.name: Goblin Grenade
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Don't underestimate the aerodynamic qualities of the common goblin.

item.name: Goblin Piker
item.flavorText: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

item.name: Goblin Tunneler
item.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: "The best way over the mountain is through."

item.name: Goblin War Paint
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under its controller's control.)
item.flavorText: "The secret to our war paint is hot peppers and stinkbugs. Lots of stinkbugs." —Skab, goblin secretkeeper

item.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
item.text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
item.flavorText: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

item.name: Grim Lavamancer
item.text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

item.name: Incinerate
item.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
item.flavorText: "Spontaneous combustion is a myth. If you burst into flame, someone wanted you to." —Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Inferno Titan
item.text: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

item.name: Lava Axe
item.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: It can chop down a redwood in a single stroke. Your sternum isn't going to fare any better.

item.name: Lightning Elemental
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: "Oh, it's easy enough to kill, but I'm not going anywhere near it." —Norin the Wary

item.name: Manabarbs
item.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
item.flavorText: "I don't know why people say a double-edged sword is bad. It's a sword. With two edges." —Kamahl, pit fighter

item.name: Manic Vandal
item.text: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

item.name: Reverberate
item.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
item.flavorText: For every action, there is a swifter and more violent reaction.

item.name: Scrambleverse
item.text: For each nonland permanent, choose a player at random. Then each player gains control of each permanent for which he or she was chosen. Untap those permanents.
item.flavorText: Sometimes a little chaos is in order.

item.name: Shock
item.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever." —Razzix, sparkmage

item.name: Slaughter Cry
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: It's rather embarrassing to end up with your head mounted over his hearth.

item.name: Stormblood Berserker
item.text: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Stormblood Berserker can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
item.flavorText: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

item.name: Tectonic Rift
item.text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: "You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!" —Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord

item.name: Volcanic Dragon
item.text: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

item.name: Wall of Torches
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
item.flavorText: The foolish try to leap through the unlit spaces. The arrogant believe the fires harmless. The wise find a different door.

item.name: Warstorm Surge
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Listen to the roar! Feel the thunder! The Immersturm shouts its approval with every bolt of lightning!"

item.name: Acidic Slime
item.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

item.name: Arachnus Spinner
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

item.name: Arachnus Web
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

item.name: Autumn's Veil
item.text: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.
item.flavorText: The rustling of leaves and a passing shadow are a dryad's only trace.

item.name: Birds of Paradise
item.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." —Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

item.name: Bountiful Harvest
item.text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
item.flavorText: "When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans." —Saelia, elvish scout

item.name: Brindle Boar
item.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!" —Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

item.name: Carnage Wurm
item.text: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Cudgel Troll
item.text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

item.name: Doubling Chant
item.text: For each creature you control, you may search your library for a creature card with the same name as that creature. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: What's scarier than one of every beast in the forest?

item.name: Dungrove Elder
item.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.
item.flavorText: All the trees of the forest are his army, and every leaf his shield.

item.name: Elvish Archdruid
item.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf you control.
item.flavorText: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

item.name: Fog
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: It's hard enough to find your way through uncharted wilderness when you can see the tip of your nose.

item.name: Garruk, Primal Hunter
item.text: +1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. -3: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. -6: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.

item.name: Garruk's Companion
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Garruk's Horde
item.text: Trample Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature card. You still pay the spell's costs.)

item.name: Giant Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "The wild is always changing, but it does have a few constants." —Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Gladecover Scout
item.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
item.flavorText: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

item.name: Greater Basilisk
item.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
item.flavorText: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

item.name: Hunter's Insight
item.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.
item.flavorText: "The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive." —Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Jade Mage
item.text: {2}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons." —Jade creed

item.name: Llanowar Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

item.name: Lure
item.text: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
item.flavorText: It makes the insignificant conspicuous, the repulsive alluring, and the deadly irresistible.

item.name: Lurking Crocodile
item.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)

item.name: Naturalize
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain." —Garruk Wildspeaker

item.name: Overrun
item.text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn. (If a creature you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

item.name: Plummet
item.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

item.name: Primeval Titan
item.text: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: When nature calls, run.

item.name: Primordial Hydra
item.text: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Rampant Growth
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

item.name: Reclaim
item.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
item.flavorText: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

item.name: Rites of Flourishing
item.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Each player may play an additional land on each of his or her turns.
item.flavorText: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

item.name: Runeclaw Bear
item.flavorText: The only honey it wants is the sweet nectar flowing through your veins.

item.name: Sacred Wolf
item.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
item.flavorText: "I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string." —Aref the Hunter

item.name: Skinshifter
item.text: {G}: Choose one — Until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a 4/4 Rhino and gains trample; or until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a 2/2 Bird and gains flying; or until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a 0/8 Plant. Activate this ability only once each turn.

item.name: Stampeding Rhino
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
item.flavorText: The quickest way to get through the jungle is to agitate a rhino and run in its wake.

item.name: Stingerfling Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

item.name: Titanic Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

item.name: Trollhide
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

item.name: Vastwood Gorger
item.flavorText: The gorger's insect-like eyes pick up the slightest movement in any direction. Its body then whips toward its prey with startling speed, swallowing it in one engulfing gulp.

item.name: Adaptive Automaton
item.text: As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
item.flavorText: Such loyalty can only be made.

item.name: Angel's Feather
item.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: The angel represents divine perfection; even the smallest feather is imbued with beauty and benevolence.

item.name: Crown of Empires
item.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.
item.flavorText: "With this crown, assert your authority." —Crown inscription

item.name: Crumbling Colossus
item.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.) When Crumbling Colossus attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

item.name: Demon's Horn
item.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

item.name: Dragon's Claw
item.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon." —Sarkhan Vol

item.name: Druidic Satchel
item.text: {2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

item.name: Elixir of Immortality
item.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
item.flavorText: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." —Baron Sengir

item.name: Greatsword
item.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: The only blow that matters is the killing blow.

item.name: Kite Shield
item.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: "To my sword I owe my glory, but to my shield I owe my life." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

item.name: Kraken's Eye
item.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

item.name: Manalith
item.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unknowingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

item.name: Pentavus
item.text: Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Put a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

item.name: Quicksilver Amulet
item.text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Those who examine the amulet too closely have been known to become part of its ornate carvings.

item.name: Rusted Sentinel
item.text: Rusted Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.
item.flavorText: It has to deliberate a moment on the best way to break your face.

item.name: Scepter of Empires
item.text: {T}: Scepter of Empires deals 1 damage to target player. It deals 3 damage to that player instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Throne of Empires.
item.flavorText: "With this scepter, smite your enemies." —Scepter inscription

item.name: Solemn Simulacrum
item.text: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.name: Sundial of the Infinite
item.text: {1}, {T}: End the turn. Activate this ability only during your turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

item.name: Swiftfoot Boots
item.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control, and it can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Thran Golem
item.text: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.
item.flavorText: The golems of the ancient Thran still draw power in ways that baffle the artificers of today.

item.name: Throne of Empires
item.text: {1}, {T}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. Put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Scepter of Empires.
item.flavorText: "With this throne, unite your nation." —Throne inscription

item.name: Worldslayer
item.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all permanents other than Worldslayer. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: "If that is what you seek, try looking in craters." —Fodrus, mastersmith

item.name: Wurm's Tooth
item.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Jevna Nor lugged it around, bragging of his triumph over the wurm. Luckily, the tavern regulars didn't notice it was only a baby tooth.

item.name: Buried Ruin
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: History has buried its treasures deep.

item.name: Dragonskull Summit
item.text: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Drowned Catacomb
item.text: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Glacial Fortress
item.text: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Rootbound Crag
item.text: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Sunpetal Grove
item.text: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G
